search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/admin/directory count=0 splunk_server=local | fields eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner, eai:acl.perms.*, eai:acl.sharing, title, eai:type, disabled | rename eai:acl.app AS app | table app | dedup app
index=_internal sourcetype="splunk_web_access" method="GET" status="200" user!=- | search app=$app_name$ | stats count latest(_time) as ViewTime by user app | stats count by user | stats count

| rest /servicesNS/-/-/admin/directory count=0 splunk_server=local | fields eai:acl.app, title | search eai:acl.app=$app_name$ | rename title AS dashboards | stats count by dashboards | stats count ```| table eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner, eai:acl.perms.*, eai:acl.sharing, title, eai:type, disabled```
| rest /services/data/lookup-table-files/ | search eai:acl.app=$app_name$ | fields eai:acl.app title | rename eai:acl.app AS app title AS lookup_file | stats count by lookup_file | stats count

index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler result_count | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | search app=$app_name$ | stats dc(result_count) by savedsearch_name, app | stats count by savedsearch_name | stats sum
| rest /services/apps/local | fields title, version | search title=$app_name$ | rename title AS app | table version

| rest /servicesNS/-/-/admin/directory count=0 splunk_server=local | fields eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner, eai:acl.perms.*, eai:acl.sharing, title, eai:type, disabled | search eai:acl.app=$app_name$ | foreach eai:*.* [ rename "<<FIELD>>" TO <<MATCHSEG2>> ] | foreach eai:* [ rename "<<FIELD>>" TO <<MATCHSTR>> ] | eval attribute=replace(title,"(.*:\s+)(.*)","\2") | eval st=replace(title,"(.*)(\s+:.*)","\1") | eval props_sourcetype=if(st==attribute,"",st) | join type=outer attribute [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/admin/props-extract count=0 splunk_server=local | fields attribute value stanza type | rename value TO props_value, stanza to props_stanza, type to props_type ] | join type=outer attribute [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/admin/transforms-extract count=0 splunk_server=local | fields REGEX FORMAT disabled eai:acl.app title FIELDS | makemv delim="," FIELDS | rename FIELDS to tf_fields, disabled to tf_disabled, REGEX to tf_regex, FORMAT to tf_format, title to attribute, eai:acl.app to tf_app] | fillnull disabled tf_disabled | table app disabled type attribute props_type props_stanza props_value props_sourcetype tf_disabled tf_format tf_fields tf_regex sharing perms.* owner | search (app="*" AND (sharing="*")) AND disabled=* | rename attribute TO "Object Name"

index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler result_count | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | search app=$app_name$ | stats avg(result_count) min(result_count) max(result_count), sparkline avg(run_time) min(run_time) max(run_time) sum(run_time) values(host) AS hosts count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time search | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS app eai:acl.owner AS owner dispatch.earliest_time AS dispatch_earliest_time dispatch.latest_time AS dispatch_latest_time] | rename search AS spl_query max(run_time) AS max_run_time | makemv delim="," values(host) | sort - avg(run_time) | eval app_run_time_min = round(max_run_time/60,2) | eval cron_description=case(cron_schedule=="0", "At every minute.", cron_schedule=="*/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute", cron_schedule=="*/30 * * * *", "At every 30th minute.", cron_schedule=="*/5 * * * *", "At every 5th minute", cron_schedule=="0 * * * *", "At minute 0", cron_schedule=="0 2 * * *", "At 02:00", cron_schedule=="0 3 * * *", "At 03:00", cron_schedule=="0 5 * * *", "At 05:00", cron_schedule=="1 * * * *", "At minute 1", cron_schedule=="1 0 * * *", "At 00:01", cron_schedule=="1 1 * * *", "At 01:01", cron_schedule=="1 3 * * *", "At 03:01", cron_schedule=="1-56/5 * * * *", "At every 5th minute from 1 through 56", cron_schedule=="5 * * * *", "At minute 5", cron_schedule=="10 * * * *", "At minute 10", cron_schedule=="10 0,4,8,12,16,20 * * *", "At minute 10 past hour 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20", cron_schedule=="10 3 * * *", "At 03:10", cron_schedule=="10,25,40,55 * * * *", "At minute 10, 25, 40, and 55", cron_schedule=="15 * * * *", "At minute 15", cron_schedule=="15 */4 * * *", "At minute 15 past every 4th hour", cron_schedule=="15 0,4,8,12,16,20 * * *", "At minute 15 past hour 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20", cron_schedule=="17 * * * *", "At minute 17", cron_schedule=="20 * * * *", "At minute 20", cron_schedule=="20 3 * * *", "At 03:20", cron_schedule=="25 * * * *", "At minute 25", cron_schedule=="30 * * * *", "At minute 30", cron_schedule=="30 0,4,8,12,16,20 * * *", "At minute 30 past hour 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20", cron_schedule=="30 4 * * *", "At 04:30", cron_schedule=="33 3 * * *", "At 03:33", cron_schedule=="35 * * * *", "At minute 35", cron_schedule=="35 3 * * *", "At 03:35", cron_schedule=="40 * * * *", "At minute 40", cron_schedule=="45 * * * *", "At minute 45", cron_schedule=="50 * * * *", "At minute 50", cron_schedule=="50 4 * * *", "At 04:50", cron_schedule=="55 0,6,12,18 * * *", "At minute 55 past hour 0, 6, 12, and 18", cron_schedule=="04,34 * * * *", "At minute 4 and 34", cron_schedule=="4-55/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 4 through 55", cron_schedule=="3-54/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 3 through 54", cron_schedule=="12 03 * * *", "At 03:12", cron_schedule=="37 */4 * * *", "At minute 37 past every 4th hour", cron_schedule=="13-59/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 13 through 59", cron_schedule=="4 1-22/4 * * *", "At minute 4 past every 4th hour from 1 through 22", cron_schedule=="6-53/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 6 through 53", cron_schedule=="6-56/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 6 through 56", cron_schedule=="3 1 * * *", "At 01:03", cron_schedule=="5-55/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 5 through 55", cron_schedule=="4-54/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 4 through 54", cron_schedule=="1-53/10 * * * *", "At every 10th minute from 1 through 53", cron_schedule=="0 9 * * 1", "At 09:00 on Monday", cron_schedule=="5-52/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 5 through 52", cron_schedule=="1-48/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 1 through 48", cron_schedule=="15 */3 * * *", "At minute 15 past every 3rd hour", cron_schedule=="5-56/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 5 through 56", cron_schedule=="11-57/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 11 through 57", cron_schedule=="3-50/15 * * * *", "3-50/15 * * * *", cron_schedule=="4-51/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 4 through 51", cron_schedule=="2-49/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 2 through 49", cron_schedule=="11-53/20 * * * *", "At every 20th minute from 11 through 53", cron_schedule=="3-53/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 3 through 53", cron_schedule=="8-54/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 8 through 54", cron_schedule=="3-53/10 * * * *", "At every 10th minute from 3 through 53", cron_schedule=="6-54/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 6 through 54", cron_schedule=="14 * * * *", "At minute 14", cron_schedule=="1-51/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 1 through 51", cron_schedule=="12 * * * *", "At minute 12", cron_schedule=="12-54/20 * * * *", "At every 20th minute from 12 through 54", cron_schedule=="7-54/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute from 7 through 54", cron_schedule=="13-50/30 * * * *", "At every 30th minute from 13 through 50", cron_schedule=="3 23 * * *", "At 23:03", cron_schedule=="0 */2 * * *", "At minute 0 past every 2nd hour", cron_schedule=="0 12 * * 1-5", "At 12:00 on every day-of-week from Monday through Friday" ) | eval app_run_time_min = round(max_run_time/60,2) | table savedsearch_name, app, owner, cron_schedule, cron_description, hosts, execution_count, sparkline, app_run_time_min
index=_internal earliest=-1d@d latest=now | search app=$app_name$ | stats latest(_time) as _time, values(view) as dashboards, values(app) as app, values(uri) as uri by user

| rest /servicesNS/-/-/admin/directory count=0 splunk_server=local | rename eai:* as *, acl.* as * | search app=$app_name$ | eval updated=strptime(updated,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%Z"), updated=if(isnull(updated),"Never",strftime(updated,"%d %b %Y")) | sort type | stats list(title) as knowledge_object, list(type) as ko_type, list(orphaned) as orphaned, list(sharing) as sharing, list(owner) as owner, list(updated) as updated by app

| rest /services/data/lookup-table-files/ | search eai:acl.app=$app_name$ | fields eai:acl.app eai:acl.owner eai:acl.perms.write eai:acl.sharing eai:data eai:userName title updated | rename eai:acl.app AS app eai:acl.owner AS owner eai:acl.perms.write AS write_perms eai:acl.sharing AS sharing eai:data AS data_file eai:userName AS user title AS lookup_name | table app owner write_perms sharing data_file user lookup_name updated

index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler result_count | search app=$app_name$ | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | stats avg(result_count) min(result_count) max(result_count), sparkline avg(run_time) min(run_time) max(run_time) sum(run_time) values(host) AS hosts count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time search | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS App eai:acl.owner AS owner dispatch.earliest_time AS dispatch_earliest_time dispatch.latest_time AS dispatch_latest_time] | rename savedsearch_name AS saved_search_name search AS "spl_query" | makemv delim="," values(host) | rex field=spl_query "(?<index_used>index=[^ ]+)" | sort - avg(run_time) | table saved_search_name app, index_used, spl_query, owner, cron_schedule hosts, execution_count, sparkline, sum(run_time) *(run_time)

| rest /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views | rename eai:acl.app AS app | search app=$app_name$ | rename eai:acl.perms.write as dashboard-write-permission | rename eai:acl.perms.read as dashboard-read-permission | rename eai:appName as appName | rename eai:data AS data | join type=outer appName [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/apps/local | rename title AS appName | rename eai:acl.perms.read AS app-read-permission | rename eai:acl.perms.write AS app-write-permission] | table app label title dashboard-read-permission dashboard-read-permission app-write-permission app-read-permission data
